articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Oil drops as economic worries, strong dollar weigh
articles.description: Oil prices dropped more than 1% on Tuesday, extending the previous day's steep declines as coronavirus lockdowns in top oil importer China, a strong dollar and growing recession risks fed worries about the outlook for global demand.
